name: Endless Winter (itch)
description:
Endless Winter

Controls
Up  Arrow Key - Jump: tap for short jump or hold for long jump
Right Arrow Key - Begin play

Created by
Michael Sim

Artwork
Michael Sim 

Sound 
Michael Sim
Nathan Altice - item/obstacle collision sound effect ('pop01.mp3')

Game developed as part of the Game Development Experience course  at the University of California Santa Cruz instructed by Nathan Altice. Originally published on May 2, 2019
